name.ja: ギャラクティカ・レミニセンス

requirement.en: Shuffle 1 Trap Card from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: All face-up Galaxy Type monsters on your field gain 400 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have "Galactica Oblivion" face-up on your field, you can make all face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

ja.set_name: Yu-Gi-Oh! GO RUSH!! Volume 1 promotional card
